name: Absorb
desc: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

name: Acrobatics
desc: Stronger when the user does not have a held item.

name: After You
desc: Gives target priority in the next turn.

name: Anchor Shot
desc: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.

name: Ancient Power
desc: May raise all user's stats at once.

name: Aqua Ring
desc: Restores a little HP each turn.

name: Aromatherapy
desc: Cures all status problems in your party.

name: Assist
desc: User performs a move known by its allies at random.

name: Assurance
desc: Power doubles if opponent already took damage in the same turn.

name: Attract
desc: If opponent is the opposite gender, it's less likely to attack.

name: Aurora Veil
desc: Halves damage from Physical and Special attacks for five turns.

name: Autotomize
desc: Reduces weight and sharply raises Speed.

name: Avalanche
desc: Power doubles if user took damage first.

name: Baby-Doll Eyes
desc: Always goes first. Lowers the target's attack.

name: Baneful Bunker
desc: Protects the user and poisons opponent on contact.

name: Baton Pass
desc: User switches out and gives stat changes to the incoming Pokémon.

name: Beak Blast
desc: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the Pokémon while it's heating up its beak results in a burn.

name: Beat Up
desc: Each Pokémon in your party attacks.

name: Belch
desc: User must have consumed a Berry.

name: Belly Drum
desc: User loses 50% of its max HP, but Attack raises to maximum.

name: Bestow
desc: Gives the user's held item to the target.

name: Bide
desc: User takes damage for two turns then strikes back double.

name: Bind
desc: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

name: Blaze Kick
desc: High critical hit ratio. May burn opponent.

name: Bounce
desc: Springs up on first turn, attacks on second. May paralyze opponent.

name: Bouncy Bubble
desc: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

name: Brick Break
desc: Breaks through Reflect and Light Screen barriers.

name: Brine
desc: Power doubles if opponent's HP is less than 50%.

name: Brutal Swing
desc: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

name: Bug Bite
desc: Receives the effect from the opponent's held berry.

name: Burn Up
desc: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.

name: Calm Mind
desc: Raises user's Special Attack and Special Defense.

name: Camouflage
desc: Changes user's type according to the location.

name: Captivate
desc: Sharply lowers opponent's Special Attack if opposite gender.

name: Celebrate
desc: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day. No battle effect.

name: Charge
desc: Raises user's Special Defense and next Electric move's power increases.

name: Circle Throw
desc: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

name: Clamp
desc: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

name: Clear Smog
desc: Removes all of the target's stat changes.

name: Close Combat
desc: Lowers user's Defense and Special Defense.

name: Coil
desc: Raises user's Attack, Defense and Accuracy.

name: Constrict
desc: May lower opponent's Speed by one stage.

name: Conversion
desc: Changes user's type to that of its first move.

name: Conversion 2
desc: User changes type to become resistant to opponent's last move.

name: Core Enforcer
desc: Scorches a 'Z' pattern on the ground.

name: Cosmic Power
desc: Raises user's Defense and Special Defense.

name: Counter
desc: When hit by a Physical Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

name: Covet
desc: Opponent's item is stolen by the user.

name: Crafty Shield
desc: Protects the Pokémon from status moves.

name: Cross Poison
desc: High critical hit ratio. May poison opponent.

name: Crush Grip
desc: More powerful when opponent has higher HP.

name: Curse
desc: Ghosts lose 50% of max HP and curse the opponent; Non-Ghosts raise Attack, Defense and lower Speed.

name: Dark Void
desc: Puts all adjacent opponents to sleep.

name: Defend Order
desc: Raises user's Defense and Special Defense.

name: Defog
desc: Lowers opponent's Evasiveness and clears fog.

name: Destiny Bond
desc: If the user faints, the opponent also faints.

name: Detect
desc: Protects the user, but may fail if used consecutively.

name: Dig
desc: Digs underground on first turn, attacks on second. Can also escape from caves.

name: Disable
desc: Opponent can't use its last attack for a few turns.

name: Dive
desc: Dives underwater on first turn, attacks on second turn.

name: Double Iron Bash
desc: Hits twice in one turn; may cause flinching.

name: Dragon Ascent
desc: Lowers user's Defense and Special Defense.

name: Dragon Hammer
desc: The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.

name: Dragon Tail
desc: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

name: Drain Punch
desc: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

name: Draining Kiss
desc: User recovers most the HP inflicted on opponent.

name: Dream Eater
desc: User recovers half the HP inflicted on a sleeping opponent.

name: Earthquake
desc: Power is doubled if opponent is underground from using Dig.

name: Electric Terrain
desc: Prevents all Pokémon from falling asleep for 5 turns.

name: Electrify
desc: Changes the target's move to Electric type.

name: Electro Ball
desc: The faster the user, the stronger the attack.

name: Encore
desc: Forces opponent to keep using its last move for 3 turns.

name: Endeavor
desc: Reduces opponent's HP to same as user's.

name: Endure
desc: Always left with at least 1 HP, but may fail if used consecutively.

name: Entrainment
desc: Makes target's ability same as user's.

name: Eruption
desc: Stronger when the user's HP is higher.

name: Extreme Evoboost
desc: Eevee-exclusive Z-Move. Sharply raises all stats.

name: Facade
desc: Power doubles if user is burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.

name: Fairy Lock
desc: Prevents fleeing in the next turn.

name: Fake Out
desc: User attacks first, foe flinches. Only usable on first turn.

name: False Swipe
desc: Always leaves opponent with at least 1 HP.

name: Feint
desc: Only hits if opponent uses Protect or Detect in the same turn.

name: Fell Stinger
desc: Drastically raises user's Attack if target is KO'd.

name: Final Gambit
desc: Inflicts damage equal to the user's remaining HP. User faints.

name: Fire Fang
desc: May cause flinching and/or burn opponent.

name: Fire Lash
desc: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

name: Fire Pledge
desc: Added effects appear if combined with Grass Pledge or Water Pledge.

name: Fire Spin
desc: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

name: First Impression
desc: Although this move has great power, it only works the first turn the user is in battle.

name: Flail
desc: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

name: Flare Blitz
desc: User receives recoil damage. May burn opponent.

name: Flatter
desc: Confuses opponent, but raises its Special Attack by two stages.

name: Floral Healing
desc: The user restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain is grass.

name: Flower Shield
desc: Sharply raises Defense of all Grass-type Pokémon on the field.

name: Fly
desc: Flies up on first turn, attacks on second turn.

name: Flying Press
desc: Deals Fighting and Flying type damage.

name: Focus Punch
desc: If the user is hit before attacking, it flinches instead.

name: Follow Me
desc: In Double Battle, the user takes all the attacks.

name: Foresight
desc: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, Normal-type and Fighting-type attacks can now hit Ghosts, and Ghost-type attacks hit Normal.

name: Freeze Shock
desc: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May paralyze opponent.

name: Freeze-Dry
desc: May freeze opponent. Super-effective against Water types.

name: Frost Breath
desc: Always results in a critical hit.

name: Fusion Bolt
desc: Power increases if Fusion Flare is used in the same turn.

name: Fusion Flare
desc: Power increases if Fusion Bolt is used in the same turn.

name: Gastro Acid
desc: Cancels out the effect of the opponent's Ability.

name: Gear Up
desc: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

name: Geomancy
desc: Charges on first turn, sharply raises user's Sp. Attack, Sp. Defense and Speed on the second.

name: Giga Drain
desc: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

name: Grass Knot
desc: The heavier the opponent, the stronger the attack.

name: Grass Pledge
desc: Added effects appear if preceded by Water Pledge or succeeded by Fire Pledge.

name: Grassy Terrain
desc: Restores a little HP of all Pokémon for 5 turns.

name: Gravity
desc: Prevents moves like Fly and Bounce and the Ability Levitate for 5 turns.

name: Growth
desc: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack.

name: Grudge
desc: If the users faints after using this move, the PP for the opponent's last move is depleted.

name: Guard Split
desc: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.

name: Guard Swap
desc: User and opponent swap Defense and Special Defense.

name: Guardian of Alola
desc: Tapu-exclusive Z-move. Cuts opponent's HP by 75%.

name: Gust
desc: Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce with double power.

name: Gyro Ball
desc: The slower the user, the stronger the attack.

name: Hail
desc: Non-Ice types are damaged for 5 turns.

name: Happy Hour
desc: Doubles prize money from trainer battles.

name: Heal Bell
desc: Heals the user's party's status conditions.

name: Heal Block
desc: Prevents the opponent from restoring HP for 5 turns.

name: Heal Order
desc: User recovers half its max HP.

name: Heal Pulse
desc: Restores half the target's max HP.

name: Healing Wish
desc: The user faints and the next Pokémon released is fully healed.

name: Heart Swap
desc: Stat changes are swapped with the opponent.

name: Heat Crash
desc: The heavier the user, the stronger the attack.

name: Heavy Slam
desc: The heavier the user, the stronger the attack.

name: Helping Hand
desc: In Double Battles, boosts the power of the partner's move.

name: Hex
desc: Inflicts more damage if the target has a status condition.

name: Hidden Power
desc: type and power depends on user's IVs.

name: High Horsepower
desc: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

name: High Jump Kick
desc: If it misses, the user loses half their HP.

name: Hold Back
desc: Always leaves opponent with at least 1 HP.

name: Hold Hands
desc: Makes the user and an ally very happy.

name: Horn Leech
desc: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

name: Hyperspace Fury
desc: Lowers user's Defense. Can strike through Protect/Detect.

name: Ice Ball
desc: Doubles in power each turn for 5 turns.

name: Ice Burn
desc: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May burn opponent.

name: Ice Fang
desc: May cause flinching and/or freeze opponent.

name: Ice Hammer
desc: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.

name: Imprison
desc: Opponent is unable to use moves that the user also knows.

name: Infestation
desc: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

name: Ingrain
desc: User restores HP each turn. User cannot escape/switch.

name: Instruct
desc: Allows an ally to use a move instead.

name: Judgment
desc: type depends on the Arceus Plate being held.

name: Jump Kick
desc: If it misses, the user loses half their HP.

name: King's Shield
desc: Protects the user and lowers opponent's Attack on contact.

name: Knock Off
desc: Removes opponent's held item for the rest of the battle.

name: Laser Focus
desc: User's next attack is guaranteed to result in a critical hit.

name: Last Resort
desc: Can only be used after all other moves are used.

name: Leech Life
desc: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

name: Leech Seed
desc: Drains HP from opponent each turn.

name: Light Screen
desc: Halves damage from Special attacks for 5 turns.

name: Light That Burns the Sky
desc: Ultra Necrozma-exclusive Z-Move. Ignores target's ability; uses highest Attack stat.

name: Liquidation
desc: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Lock-On
desc: User's next attack is guaranteed to hit.

name: Low Kick
desc: The heavier the opponent, the stronger the attack.

name: Lucky Chant
desc: Opponent cannot land critical hits for 5 turns.

name: Lunar Dance
desc: The user faints but the next Pokémon released is fully healed.

name: Lunge
desc: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: Magic Coat
desc: Reflects moves that cause status conditions back to the attacker.

name: Magic Room
desc: Suppresses the effects of held items for five turns.

name: Magma Storm
desc: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

name: Magnet Rise
desc: User becomes immune to Ground-type moves for 5 turns.

name: Magnetic Flux
desc: Raises Defense and Sp. Defense of Plus/Minus Pokémon.

name: Me First
desc: User copies the opponent's attack with 1.5× power.

name: Mega Drain
desc: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

name: Memento
desc: User faints, sharply lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack.

name: Metal Burst
desc: Deals damage equal to 1.5x opponent's attack.

name: Metronome
desc: User performs almost any move in the game at random.

name: Milk Drink
desc: User recovers half its max HP.

name: Mind Reader
desc: User's next attack is guaranteed to hit.

name: Miracle Eye
desc: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, removes Dark's Psychic immunity.

name: Mirror Coat
desc: When hit by a Special Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

name: Mirror Move
desc: User performs the opponent's last move.

name: Mist
desc: User's stats cannot be changed for a period of time.

name: Misty Terrain
desc: Protects the field from status conditions for 5 turns.

name: Moonlight
desc: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

name: Morning Sun
desc: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

name: Mud Sport
desc: Weakens the power of Electric-type moves.

name: Natural Gift
desc: Power and type depend on the user's held berry.

name: Nature Power
desc: Uses a certain move based on the current terrain.

name: Night Shade
desc: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

name: Nightmare
desc: The sleeping opponent loses 25% of its max HP each turn.

name: Noble Roar
desc: Lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack.

name: Oblivion Wing
desc: User recovers most of the HP inflicted on opponent.

name: Odor Sleuth
desc: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, Normal-type and Fighting-type attacks can now hit Ghosts, and Ghost-type attacks hit Normal.

name: Ominous Wind
desc: May raise all user's stats at once.

name: Outrage
desc: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

name: Pain Split
desc: The user's and opponent's HP becomes the average of both.

name: Parabolic Charge
desc: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

name: Parting Shot
desc: Lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack then switches out.

name: Pay Day
desc: A small amount of money is gained after the battle resolves.

name: Payback
desc: Power doubles if the user was attacked first.

name: Perish Song
desc: Any Pokémon in play when this attack is used faints in 3 turns.

name: Petal Dance
desc: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

name: Phantom Force
desc: Disappears on first turn, attacks on second. Can strike through Protect/Detect.

name: Photon Geyser
desc: Uses Attack or Special Attack stat, whichever is higher.

name: Pika Papow
desc: Power increases when player's bond is stronger.

name: Plasma Fists
desc: Changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

name: Pluck
desc: If the opponent is holding a berry, its effect is stolen by user.

name: Poison Tail
desc: High critical hit ratio. May poison opponent.

name: Pollen Puff
desc: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.

name: Powder
desc: Damages Pokémon using Fire type moves.

name: Power Split
desc: Averages Attack and Special Attack with the target.

name: Power Swap
desc: User and opponent swap Attack and Special Attack.

name: Power Trick
desc: User's own Attack and Defense switch.

name: Power Trip
desc: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the move's power.

name: Prismatic Laser
desc: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Protect
desc: Protects the user, but may fail if used consecutively.

name: Psychic Fangs
desc: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect.

name: Psychic Terrain
desc: Prevents priority moves from being used for 5 turns.

name: Psycho Shift
desc: Gives the opponent the user's status condition, if it hits.

name: Psyshock
desc: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

name: Psystrike
desc: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

name: Punishment
desc: Power increases when opponent's stats have been raised.

name: Purify
desc: The user heals the target's status condition. If the move succeeds, it also restores the user's own HP.

name: Pursuit
desc: Double power if the opponent is switching out.

name: Quash
desc: Makes the target act last this turn.

name: Quick Guard
desc: Protects the user's team from high-priority moves.

name: Quiver Dance
desc: Raises user's Special Attack, Special Defense and Speed.

name: Rage Powder
desc: Forces attacks to hit user, not team-mates.

name: Razor Wind
desc: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. High critical hit ratio.

name: Recover
desc: User recovers half its max HP.

name: Recycle
desc: User's used hold item is restored.

name: Reflect
desc: Halves damage from Physical attacks for 5 turns.

name: Relic Song
desc: May put the target to sleep.

name: Rest
desc: User sleeps for 2 turns, but user is fully healed.

name: Retaliate
desc: Inflicts double damage if a teammate fainted on the last turn.

name: Revelation Dance
desc: type changes based on Oricorio's form.

name: Revenge
desc: Power increases if user was hit first.

name: Reversal
desc: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

name: Roar
desc: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

name: Rollout
desc: Doubles in power each turn for 5 turns.

name: Roost
desc: User recovers half of its max HP and loses the Flying type temporarily.

name: Rototiller
desc: Raises Attack and Special Attack of Grass-types.

name: Round
desc: Power increases if teammates use it in the same turn.

name: Safeguard
desc: The user's party is protected from status conditions.

name: Sand Tomb
desc: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

name: Sappy Seed
desc: Drains HP from opponent each turn.

name: Secret Power
desc: Effects of the attack vary with the location.

name: Secret Sword
desc: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

name: Seismic Toss
desc: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

name: Shadow Bone
desc: The user attacks by beating the target with a bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Shadow Force
desc: Disappears on first turn, attacks on second. Can strike through Protect/Detect.

name: Shell Smash
desc: Sharply raises user's Attack, Special Attack and Speed but lowers Defense and Special Defense.

name: Shell Trap
desc: Deals more damage to opponent if hit by a Physical move.

name: Shift Gear
desc: Raises user's Attack and sharply raises Speed.

name: Shore Up
desc: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.

name: Silver Wind
desc: May raise all stats of user at once.

name: Sketch
desc: Permanently copies the opponent's last move.

name: Skill Swap
desc: The user swaps Abilities with the opponent.

name: Skull Bash
desc: Raises Defense on first turn, attacks on second.

name: Sky Attack
desc: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May cause flinching.

name: Sky Drop
desc: Takes opponent into the air on first turn, drops them on second turn.

name: Sky Uppercut
desc: Hits the opponent, even during Fly.

name: Slack Off
desc: User recovers half its max HP.

name: Sleep Talk
desc: User performs one of its own moves while sleeping.

name: Smack Down
desc: Makes Flying-type Pokémon vulnerable to Ground moves.

name: Smart Strike
desc: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

name: Smelling Salts
desc: Power doubles if opponent is paralyzed, but cures it.

name: Snatch
desc: Steals the effects of the opponent's next move.

name: Snore
desc: Can only be used if asleep. May cause flinching.

name: Soak
desc: Changes the target's type to water.

name: Soft-Boiled
desc: User recovers half its max HP.

name: Solar Beam
desc: Charges on first turn, attacks on second.

name: Solar Blade
desc: Charges on first turn, attacks on second.

name: Sparkling Aria
desc: Heals the burns of its target.

name: Sparkly Swirl
desc: Cures all status problems in the party Pokémon.

name: Spectral Thief
desc: The user hides in the target's shadow, steals the target's stat boosts, and then attacks.

name: Speed Swap
desc: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

name: Spikes
desc: Hurts opponents when they switch into battle.

name: Spiky Shield
desc: Protects the user and inflicts damage on contact.

name: Spit Up
desc: Power depends on how many times the user performed Stockpile.

name: Spite
desc: The opponent's last move loses 2-5 PP.

name: Spotlight
desc: The user shines a spotlight on the target so that only the target will be attacked during the turn.

name: Sticky Web
desc: Lowers opponent's Speed when switching into battle.

name: Stockpile
desc: Stores energy for use with Spit Up and Swallow.

name: Stomping Tantrum
desc: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user's previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.

name: Stored Power
desc: Power increases when user's stats have been raised.

name: Storm Throw
desc: Always results in a critical hit.

name: Strength Sap
desc: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the target's Attack stat. It also lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: Struggle
desc: Only usable when all PP are gone. Hurts the user.

name: Substitute
desc: Uses HP to creates a decoy that takes hits.

name: Sucker Punch
desc: User attacks first, but only works if opponent is readying an attack.

name: Super Fang
desc: Always takes off half of the opponent's HP.

name: Swagger
desc: Opponent becomes confused, but its Attack is sharply raised.

name: Swallow
desc: The more times the user has performed Stockpile, the more HP is recovered.

name: Switcheroo
desc: Swaps held items with the opponent.

name: Synchronoise
desc: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.

name: Synthesis
desc: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

name: Taunt
desc: Opponent can only use moves that attack.

name: Tearful Look
desc: The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Techno Blast
desc: type depends on the Drive being held.

name: Telekinesis
desc: Ignores opponent's Evasiveness for three turns, add Ground immunity.

name: Teleport
desc: Allows user to flee wild battles; also warps player to last PokéCenter.

name: Thousand Arrows
desc: Makes Flying-type Pokémon vulnerable to Ground moves.

name: Thrash
desc: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

name: Throat Chop
desc: Prevents use of sound moves for two turns.

name: Thunder Fang
desc: May cause flinching and/or paralyze opponent.

name: Torment
desc: Opponent cannot use the same move in a row.

name: Toxic Spikes
desc: Poisons opponents when they switch into battle.

name: Toxic Thread
desc: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target's Speed stat.

name: Transform
desc: User takes on the form and attacks of the opponent.

name: Tri Attack
desc: May paralyze, burn or freeze opponent.

name: Trick
desc: Swaps held items with the opponent.

name: Trick Room
desc: Slower Pokémon move first in the turn for 5 turns.

name: Triple Kick
desc: Hits thrice in one turn at increasing power.

name: Trump Card
desc: The lower the PP, the higher the power.

name: Twineedle
desc: Hits twice in one turn. May poison opponent.

name: Twister
desc: May cause flinching. Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce with double power.

name: U-turn
desc: User switches out immediately after attacking.

name: Uproar
desc: User attacks for 3 turns and prevents sleep.

name: V-create
desc: Lowers user's Defense, Special Defense and Speed.

name: Veevee Volley
desc: Power increases when player's bond is stronger.

name: Venom Drench
desc: Lowers poisoned opponent's Special Attack and Speed.

name: Venoshock
desc: Inflicts double damage if the target is poisoned.

name: Vital Throw
desc: User attacks last, but ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

name: Volt Switch
desc: User must switch out after attacking.

name: Volt Tackle
desc: User receives recoil damage. May paralyze opponent.

name: Wake-Up Slap
desc: Power doubles if opponent is asleep, but wakes it up.

name: Water Pledge
desc: Added effects appear if preceded by Fire Pledge or succeeded by Grass Pledge.

name: Water Sport
desc: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

name: Water Spout
desc: The higher the user's HP, the higher the damage caused.

name: Weather Ball
desc: Move's power and type changes with the weather.

name: Whirlpool
desc: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

name: Whirlwind
desc: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

name: Wide Guard
desc: Protects the user's team from multi-target attacks.

name: Wish
desc: The user recovers HP in the following turn.

name: Wonder Room
desc: Swaps every Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense for 5 turns.

name: Work Up
desc: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack.

name: Worry Seed
desc: Changes the opponent's Ability to Insomnia.

name: Wrap
desc: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

name: Wring Out
desc: The higher the opponent's HP, the higher the damage.

name: Yawn
desc: Puts opponent to sleep in the next turn.

name: Zing Zap
desc: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target, giving it an electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.
